From: Roaklin <roaklin@...>

" My dear Generals, the time to strike is now," the
shadowy figure said to the others in the chamber.

 The other Predicon generals nodded at thier comrade's
statement.

  "Hell Beast is as big a threat to us in the past as
he was here in the present," the general continued
pounding a fist on the table before him,"He could
change the fabric of time itself much as we feared
Megatron would try."

 "Then what are we to do?" asked one General.

 "We send a warship into the past to destroy Hell
Beast and any of his followers," the general said.

 "What of the Maximals?"

 "They are not our concern," the general said," thou
they can serve as target practice for the ship we
send."

 "Who can we trust to do this?"

 The General smiled, he tapped a control pad on the
table. A holoprojector clicked on in the table's
center showing a fearsome looking warship.

  " We can send the Militrons."


-OOC-Do not reply to this message it's an ongoing
multi-part story that will come to Earth in time-
thx



=====
When the going gets tough,
the tough go get a tank!
